data.persona: I live in the kingdom.  I pay taxes to the king.  I dislike my lot in life.
data.description:
You are in the Foyer.
It is a grand room, with two ornate staircases leading up either side to a second floor balcony where there is a doorway at the very center.  Other doorways occupy the sides of the second floor landing.
There's a painting., a balcony, a doorway, and a staircase here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I cannot believe the person got in my way
data.mid_motivation: I have pressing matters to discuss with the King
data.long_motivation: I had my home destroyed by the rebels and am hoping the King will rebuild it
